issue.title: Not able to visualise ur10 in gzweb / gazebo7

content.raw:
Not in the code. It was mostly a problem on my side: understanding what needed to be done to spawn the (ROS) model for it to be displayed in gzweb. The last issue I had was a combination of a problem with my urdf and a bad GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH.

It might be good to have a tutorial for this though - with a link from that README, since the information was hard to come by. I'm happy to write it, but do you have a suggestion on where to put it?

Cheers,

Ugo
content.html:
Not in the code. It was mostly a problem on my side: understanding what needed to be done to spawn the (ROS) model for it to be displayed in gzweb. The last issue I had was a combination of a problem with my urdf and a bad GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH.

It might be good to have a tutorial for this though - with a link from that README, since the information was hard to come by. I'm happy to write it, but do you have a suggestion on where to put it?

Cheers,
